1.0.1.name: wordpress/equivalent-mobile-redirect
1.0.1.description: This WordPress plugin will detect mobile devices and redirect the user to the equivalent mobile page as set in the plugin admin panel. Redirects are set by entering the page title you want to redirect and a corresponding URL. This plugin also gives you the ability to allow mobile viewers to bypass the mobile redirect and "View Full Site" by using a cookie that can easily be set on your mobile site.
